overview: Head north with us to the productive Klamath River to join Mark Warner of the American Fishing Foundation in small town called Klamath Glen, located just below the California/ Oregon border, for some of the finest salmon fishing to be found anywhere in the country. Get a first-hand look at how the salmon quota is divided up and the measures that are being taken to preserve this fishery.
title: Showdown on the Klamath River
